cyclone.name: BILL
cyclone.current_location: about 155 miles SSE of Galveston, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest toward the central Texas coast, then expected to continue inland across south-central Texas
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Port O’Connor / Matagorda Bay, TX

weather_observation.watch_coast: None in Louisiana – watches limited to Texas coast Baffin Bay to High Island
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Baffin Bay to High Island, TX
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Upper Texas coast and western Louisiana coast (including Lake Charles area)
weather_observation.wind: Occasional tropical-storm-force gusts (35–45 mph) possible as outer bands move inland
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge 1–2 ft above ground along the western Louisiana shoreline
weather_observation.rainfall: 2–4 inches of heavy rain with locally higher totals could cause ponding and minor flooding
weather_observation.other_hazards: Brief tornadoes/waterspouts in rain bands cannot be ruled out
